title: Evaluating the mortality and health rate caused by the PM<sub>2.5</sub> pollutant in the air of several important Iranian cities and evaluating the effect of variables with a linear time series model
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Zahra Kazemi, Ahmad Jonidi Jafari, Mahdi Farzadkia, Payam Amini, Majid Kermani
